meanings.sent1: The sky's color was changeless throughout the day.
meanings.sent2: She loved the changeless rhythm of the ocean waves.
meanings.sent3: The changeless clock seemed to be stuck in time.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as changeless as the North Star.
meanings.sent5: The mountain stood changeless against the passing of time.

meanings.definition: Not subject to change or alteration.
meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins remained changeless over centuries.
meanings.sent2: Her loyalty to her friends was changeless and unwavering.
meanings.sent3: The changeless recipe always produced the perfect cake.
meanings.sent4: His principles were as changeless as the laws of nature.
meanings.sent5: The old tree stood changeless in the midst of a changing world.
